comments.content: It's Arabic calligraphy; it's not a font.

but it is font. i find it in Encyclopedia Arabic Fonts.  
thanks. :)

Any text in any font can be scrambled to make head-scratching game!  
Arabic calligraphy is achieved by scrambling words (not letters).  
Just have a look at what has been done with one of our newly-built fonts:  
 [http://www.maryamsoft.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819231832/http:/www.maryamsoft.com/ "http://www.maryamsoft.com/")  
P/S : It will disappear after a couple of days!
Well, if it's in an encyclopedia of fonts, you'd think it would say what font it is.
